title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practice Competencies: Hybrid-Based Doctoral Program in Nursing Practice: Evidence-Based Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design a research protocol for evidence-based practice within one week.
Learners can analyze three decision-making cases in nursing practice using digital resources accessible in mobile environments.
Learners can collaboratively develop a project proposal to solve real-world clinical problems and submit it as a final assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
